entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: ENE 35 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
